lead_paragraph: For the people of Pittsburgh, the opening of the N.H.L. playoffs is a welcome distraction from the coming verdict from the N.F.L. on Ben Roethlisberger’s off-season behavior.
snippet: For the people of Pittsburgh, the opening of the N.H.L. playoffs is a welcome distraction from the coming verdict from the N.F.L. on Ben Roethlisberger’s off-season behavior.
